dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.
dependencies.name: libx11

dependencies.description:
The libXau package contains a library implementing the X11 Authorization
Protocol. This is useful for restricting client access to the display.
dependencies.name: libxau

dependencies.description:
Xaw is the X Athena Widget Set. Xaw is a widget set based on the X
Toolkit Intrinsics (Xt) Library.
dependencies.name: libxaw

dependencies.description: libXdmcp - X Display Manager Control Protocol library.
dependencies.name: libxdmcp

dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.
dependencies.name: libxext

dependencies.description:
X FreeType library. Xft version 2.1 was the first stand alone release of
Xft, a library that connects X applications with the FreeType font
rasterization library. Xft uses fontconfig to locate fonts so it has no
configuration files.
dependencies.name: libxft

dependencies.description: libXinerama - API for Xinerama extension to X11 Protocol.
dependencies.name: libxinerama

dependencies.description:
This library contains miscellaneous utilities and is not part of the
Xlib standard. It contains routines which only use public interfaces so
that it may be layered on top of any proprietary implementation of Xlib
or Xt.
dependencies.name: libxmu

dependencies.description: libXpm - X Pixmap (XPM) image file format library.
dependencies.name: libxpm

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.
dependencies.name: util-macros

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
